config.description: Config - Key-value pairs for configuring an add-on.

enabled.description: Enabled - Whether the add-on is enabled or not.

addon.description: AddonProfiles - Profile of managed cluster add-on.

count.description: Count - Number of agents to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

customSize.description: CustomSize Specifies cpu/memory information for custom VMSize types.

vmSize.description: VMSize - Size of agent VMs. Possible values

hardwareConfig.description: HardwareConfig -  Specifies cpu/memory information for custom VMSize types.

adminUsername.description: AdminUsername - The administrator username to use for Linux VMs.

keyData.description: KeyData - Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

publicKeys.description: PublicKeys - The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with Linux-based VMs. Only expect one key specified.

ssh.description: SSH - SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

linuxProfile.description: LinuxProfile - Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

mode.description: Mode - AgentPoolMode represents mode of an agent pool. Possible values include: 'AgentPoolModeSystem', 'AgentPoolModeUser'

nodeLabels.description: NodeLabels - Agent pool node labels to be persisted across all nodes in agent pool.

nodeTaints.description: NodeTaints - Taints added to new nodes during node pool create and scale. For example, key=value:NoSchedule.

osDiskSizeGB.description: OsDiskSizeGB - OS Disk Size in GB to be used to specify the disk size for every machine in this master/agent pool. If you specify 0, it will apply the default osDisk size according to the vmSize specified.

osType.description: OsType - OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux. Possible values include: 'Linux', 'Windows'

tags.description: Tags - Agent pool tags to be persisted on the agent pool virtual machine scale set.

adminPassword.description:
AdminPassword - Specifies the password of the administrator account.

**Minimum-length:** 8 characters

**Max-length:** 123 characters

**Complexity requirements:** 3 out of 4 conditions below need to be fulfilled
Has lower characters
Has upper characters
Has a digit
Has a special character (Regex match [\W_])

**Disallowed values:** "abc@123", "P@$$w0rd", "P@ssw0rd", "P@ssword123", "Pa$$word", "pass@word1", "Password!", "Password1", "Password22", "iloveyou!"

adminUsername.description:
AdminUsername - Specifies the name of the administrator account.

**restriction:** Cannot end in "."

**Disallowed values:** "administrator", "admin", "user", "user1", "test", "user2", "test1", "user3", "admin1", "1", "123", "a", "actuser", "adm", "admin2", "aspnet", "backup", "console", "david", "guest", "john", "owner", "root", "server", "sql", "support", "support_388945a0", "sys", "test2", "test3", "user4", "user5".

**Minimum-length:** 1 character

**Max-length:** 20 characters

enableCSIProxy.description: EnableCSIProxy - Whether to enable CSI proxy.

licenseType.description: LicenseType - The licenseType to use for Windows VMs. Windows_Server is used to enable Azure Hybrid User Benefits for Windows VMs. Possible values include: 'LicenseTypeNone', 'LicenseTypeWindowsServer'

windowsProfile.description: WindowsProfile - Profile for Windows VMs in the container service cluster.

kubernetesVersion.description: KubernetesVersion - Version of Kubernetes specified when creating the managed cluster.

dnsServiceIP.description: DNSServiceIP - An IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service. It must be within the Kubernetes service address range specified in serviceCidr.

dockerBridgeCidr.description: DockerBridgeCidr - A CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the Kubernetes service address range.

networkPlugin.description: NetworkPlugin - Network plugin used for building Kubernetes network. Possible values include: 'Azure', 'Kubenet'

podCidr.description: PodCidr - A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign pod IPs when kubenet is used.

serviceCidr.description: ServiceCidr - A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign service cluster IPs. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges.

nodeResourceGroup.description: NodeResourceGroup - Name of the resource group containing agent pool nodes.

vnetSubnetID.description: VnetSubnetID - VNet SubnetID specifies the VNet's subnet identifier.

errorMessage.description: ErrorMessage will be set in the event that there is a terminal problem reconciling the AddOn and will contain a more verbose string suitable for logging and human consumption.

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of cluster actuation. E.g. Pending, Running, Terminating, Failed etc.

errorMessage.description: ErrorMessage - Error messsages during creation of cluster

code.description: Code - Tells whether the cluster is Running or Stopped. Possible values include: 'CodeRunning', 'CodeStopped'

powerState.description: PowerState - Represents the Power State of the cluster

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of cluster actuation. E.g. Pending, Running, Terminating, Failed etc.

status.description: AKSEdgeClusterStatus defines the observed state of AKSEdgeCluster

clustersProperties.description: AKSEdgeClusterSpec defines the desired state of AKSEdgeCluster

ResourceProviderOperationList.description: Results of the request to list operations.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation applies to data-plane.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

display.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

ResourceProviderOperation.description: Results of the request to list operations.
